trans-unit.source: Represents the location of a Ribbon control on the Microsoft Office Menu relative to a built-in control, the location of a tab relative to a built-in tab, or the location of a group relative to a built-in group.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Microsoft Office 菜单上功能区控件相对于内置控件的位置、选项卡相对于内置选项卡的位置或组相对于内置组的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> to specify the location of a group on a built-in tab, relative to a built-in group on the tab. For more information, see [How to: Customize a Built-in Tab](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.Position%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGroup>内置选项卡上，相对于选项卡上的内置组指定的组的位置。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 自定义内置选项卡](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use the `Position` property of controls that can be used on the Microsoft Office Menu, such as <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, to specify the location of the control relative to a built-in control on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Position`可以在 Microsoft Office 菜单上，如使用的控件的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>，以指定相对于菜单上的内置控件的控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The `Position` property of these controls has no effect when the controls are placed on a Ribbon tab. For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md).
trans-unit.target: `Position`这些控件的属性时控件放置在功能区选项卡上没有任何作用。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab.Position%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab> to specify the location of the tab relative to a built-in tab.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab.Position%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab>指定相对于内置选项卡的选项卡上的位置。

trans-unit.source: To create an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition> object, call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.AfterOfficeId%2A> method or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.BeforeOfficeId%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition>对象，请调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.AfterOfficeId%2A>方法或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.BeforeOfficeId%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics> object at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.RibbonPosition%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics>通过使用在运行时对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.RibbonPosition%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to access the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object:
trans-unit.target: 可通过两种方法来访问 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> 对象：

trans-unit.source: By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the built-in Ribbon control, group, or tab that the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> uses to define a relative location for another control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取内置功能区控件、组或选项卡的 ID，当前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 将其用于定义另一控件、组或选项卡的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a built-in Ribbon control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 内置功能区控件、组或选项卡的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID is a name that uniquely identifies a control, group, or tab that is built into a Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 该 ID 是唯一标识控件、 组或内置于 Microsoft Office 应用程序的选项卡的名称。

trans-unit.source: For a list of IDs, see the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).
trans-unit.target: Id 的列表，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心网页[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> represents a location before or after a built-in control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 表示内置控件、组或选项卡之前还是之后的位置。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> represents a location before or after a built-in control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示是否当前<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" />表示一个位置之前或之后内置控件、 组或选项卡。
